name: Club One Seven Phuket

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll just add my glowing review to the many other glowing reviews. I had such a great time here in early May. Daniel, Mack and the other staff do everything they can to make your stay enjoyable and stressfree, which for me, being a first time traveler to Thailand/Phuket, was a great thing to have happen. The service standards are as good as a 5-star hotel, nothing is ever too much trouble, the food is great and the cocktails are lethal (in a good way). The location is very good too - 10 mins to the beach and the centre of Patong. Can't recommend it highly enough and looking fwd to staying again.
reviews.title: Yet another happy customer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great rooms, very friendly and helpfull staff. I stayed in the poolside room, which was very spacious and fantastic. Food at their restaurant is of a very high standard and reasonably priced. I want to get back there as soon as I can. Is a short walk to the beach and is also close to the shops, restaurants etc
reviews.title: This is a property that I would like to stay at again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I can highly reccommend this delightful gay hotel. It is extreemly clean, very well run, has friendly and efficient staff and is located in a hassle free area only 10 minutes walk from all the action and nightlife.
reviews.title: Warm, welcoming and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed 7 nights and had a great room overlooking the garden and swimming pool.
reviews.title: How far can they go?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not a seedy gay hotel but a mainstream hotel whose guests are all gay.
reviews.title: Friendly, Cheerful & Cosy place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The CLub really is a Home Away from Home as their tagline says. I have stayed now . . I think this was the 8th time, and brought with me 9 friends to help celebrate my birthday. Daniel, Mack, and all the staff are outstanding from the moment you reserve till the moment you leave. You feel like you are staying at someone's home with the attentive service and the special touches. They recently remodeled the lobby and restaurant area and it is a great place to hang out if you need a little time away from the hub bub of Patong beach. The staff can arrange just about anything you need, all you need to do is ask. They will also do something special if you like - for my birthday, they surprised me with a decorated room, roses on the bed, and a special gift. I've been going to the Club now over the last 5 years and would never dream of staying anywhere else in Phuket. It is great value for the money and there is soooo much to be said for staying somewhere where the staff is more like your friends. Keep up the great work and see you all soon!
reviews.title: Repeat Visit to Club One Seven and never happier!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I returned to Club One Seven earlier this month for a short stay,it had been 9 months since my previous visit,and i was really amazed at hte new renovations,the designers and builders have done an amazing job,it is now so modern and inviting,the managaer Daniel and his staff are by far the best i have ever encountered in Thailand,Club One Seven is like a home away from home,and i for one will always be returning there as they always make you feel like a person and not just a room number.
reviews.title: SENSATIONAL RENOVATIONS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would like to thank Daniel and his staff for such a fantastic time while we stayed for the gay carnival. The room was perfect while the surroundings where relaxed, comfortable and clean and nothing is ever a problem for the dedicated team who take care of you from the moment you arrive. Keep up the good work boys and girls. Hope to see you soon. Jim Burke Northern Ireland
reviews.title: Cant wait to get back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You should forget any ideas of this being a B&B like we are used to in UK and Europe. It's more a small hotel with staff who cant do enough for you and who make your stay delightful. At first it seems a little bit far outside the main centre of Patong but really its just a 15 minute stroll to the main bar areas, and less than 5 minutes to the beach. Its location makes it perfect for those who want to enjoy the delights Patong has to offer, but is far enough away so that you can get a decent nights sleep when you want one. Although on a town road, you hear no traffic noise when in your rooms - we had front facing room for our first stay and a garden view on second visit. Downstairs is a smart bar, nice cake selection and a very good menu offering real Thai food as well as some Euro dishes. The rooms are a good size, spotlessly clean, modern bathrooms and seemingly brand new beds and very comfortable mattresses. The pool is more a plunge pool than a swimming pool, but it's ncie to jump in at the end of a hot day and cool off. You can do your real swimming in the sea just a few minutes walk away. Best of all are the staff - every person is delightful, always smiling, always ready to help you and they make it a glorious place to spend time in Phuket. No doubt we will be back.
reviews.title: We liked it so much we went back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really great gay/gay friendly guest house. Away from the main (& sometimes seedier) part of town, but close enough to walk or taxi in (when you feel like being seedy), about 10 mins from beach. Uber friendly staff, great food. Like others, loved the fact that the charming guys who cleaned the rooms made the towels into elephants and swans every day! Stayed in early January in the big poolside (v small pool!) room - wonderful fittings very modern & cool. Hotel organised snorkelling trips were excellent value & great fun.
reviews.title: fabulous guest house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Club One Seven is not huge and spanking new like many of the hotels going up in Phuket, but on the other hand it does not feel like an impersonal hotel, but more of a great guesthouse with a bar and restaurant. As a result, it was a great place to meet other travellers. I was really surprised by the high level of attention to me by the manager (owner?) and staff. Always friendly, always available. You won't be impressed by the exterior, but not to worry. On arrival, I was upgraded to a really nice room. The housekeeping team kept my room spotless. I loved the different daily towel arrangements on my bed :)). The room had good aircon, good free wifi signal, large fridge and an electronic safe. I found the food in the restaurant to be quite good. Having never been to Phuket before, as always, finding the right location is a gamble. It turned out that this location was ideal - at the quiet end of the city, just a short walk to the beach.
reviews.title: Great service, spotlessly clean, near the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The place has transformed into a top class accommodation for those with good taste when I stayed there again last week in Patong, Phuket.
reviews.title: Great Place & Great Staff - My Second Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: It is now fully air-cond with partial glass roof. Making one able to enjoy the sunlight but not to be burnt. With the beautiful deco and the smoothing music, it was such a lovely place to relax everyday after the tiring trips.
reviews.title: hen only the best will do

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Daniel and the team were so friendly that I felt at home again even before I stepped into the lobby. They came to the road to meet us once we got out from the taxi and from then on, we were never feeling alone.
reviews.title: Simply faultless...what a star!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We took the room G002 which was just next to the pool and it was a perfect choice. Besides being so conveniently near the relaxing pool, the room was spacious with wonderful fittings and decorations. The twin body jet shower always made us hard to get out from it while the mirror ceiling made our dreams turned more lovely every night.
reviews.title: Home from home indeed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wanting to experience the hustle and bustle of Patong but not wanting to hear it all not long made Club One Seven the perfect place to stay.
reviews.title: Perfect place for a Phuket visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Located within five minutes walk of beautiful Patong Beach and ten minutes walk to the nightclubs of Patong this really was a great location.
reviews.title: We had a fabulous time and will definitely be back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very helpful and friendly and always available to assist no matter what the request. A nice touch was the great choice of free breakfasts served to you at any time of the day so you got to have a sleep in after a late night out experiencing the buzzing Patong nightlife.
reviews.title: The one true home away from home...you will want to return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were clean, spacious and had everything you needed including extras like spare toothbrushes in case you forgot to bring yours or have a friend sleep over.
reviews.title: Amazing place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We'd definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: So unexpected and absolutely refreshing

description: Club One Seven Phuket is a boutique guesthouse and cafe/restaurant well located in Patong Beach, Phuket, Thailand. Club One Seven Phuket is your perfect base for exploring the many charms and activities available in Phuket. It has everything you would desire in a vacation, from pure comfort and relaxation to great adventures and lively night-life. Hailed by former guests as "home away from home" , Club One Seven Phuket is gay owned and gay managed. All are welcome to this GLBT oriented accommodation, but you need to be gay friendly! Club One Seven Phuket has a newly landscaped pool garden located by the riverside, a Gym and Fitness Center, and Free WIFI and high speed Internet access throughout. It is conveniently located, in a quiet and hassle-free area of Patong, near boutique art galleries. We are just 300 meters to the renowned Patong Beach, with easy access to Karon and Kata beaches, popular discos and bars, Simon Cabaret, shopping malls, Paradise Complex and many other diverse entertainment opportunities for all lifestyles.
